EmailTemplate.description: This is an email template sent out when a Non-North American case is closed
EmailTemplate.name: SE Case Close Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*** CASE CLOSED NOTIFICATION ***
Hi {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The following case has been CLOSED.

Case #: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Issue Description: {!Case.Subject}
Customer: {!Case.Customer_Name__c}
Customer ACN: {!Case.Customer_ACN__c}
Customer SAP ID: {!Case.Customer_SAP_ID__c}
Customer Phone: {!Case.Customer_Phone__c}
Customer Address: {!Case.Customer_Address__c}
Contact Name: {!Contact.Name}
Contact Email: {!Contact.Email}
Case Category: {!Case.Case_Category__c}
Click on the link to access the case: {!Case.Link}
